item.description:
Slip into your sexiest red shoes and get ready to mingle with other shoe and fashion lovers at our annual Red Shoe Soiree: a celebration of all things hot, sexy and red. Guests will enjoy complimentary delicious appetizers, signature cocktails (Vlora is famous for its martinis), a pink carpet walk-off for the Best-in-Shoe competition, prizes and a fashion and trunk show featuring Smiling Stiletto members modeling designs by Boston based Avni Fashion. 

 

Avni Fashion is a eco-friendly, ready to wear, Boston based fashion brand founded in 2010. All designs are crafted from fabrics that are exclusively commissioned and hand made by artisans in India. Designs offer a mix of sharp tailoring and gentle draping; neutral colors accented by vibrant patterns and unique Eastern fabrics in a modern Western silhouette. Don't miss the opportunity to check out Avni's gorgeous clothes. Preview some of their collection at: www.avnifashion.com   

 

Also joining us will be Jennifer Sheehan, founder of Sprinkle the Love. Each guest will receive a complimentary Spinkle the Love tote bag.

 

So break out those gorgeous red shoes (or any other sexy shoes) and celebrate the season of love with great food, cocktails, fashion, friends and fun!  Event is free- guests are encouraged to join the Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club, a free social organization for shoe and fashion lovers with over 2,800 members in the Boston area. www.smilingstiletto.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the private room. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Ladies Night: Red Shoe Soiree and Fashion Show
